spec_data.Name: gnome-shell-extension-media-player-indicator
spec_data.Description:
This GNOME Shell extension controls any MPRIS v2.1 capable media player.

This extension will monitor D-Bus for active players and automatically display
them in the GNOME Shell's volume menu by default.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Wed 09 Aug 2017 01:51:36 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Control MPRIS2 capable media players: Rhythmbox, Banshee, Clementine and more
